#cloud-config
ssh_authorized_keys:
## Note: Replace with your own public key
  - ssh-rsa  denbl@DESKTOP-F8SM41L


package_update: true

packages:
 - git

runcmd:
- curl -sfL https://get.k3s.io | sudo sh -
- sudo systemctl -l status k3s --no-pager
- curl -SLs https://get.arkade.dev/ | sudo sh
- sudo chmod 744 /etc/rancher/k3s/k3s.yaml
- sudo mkdir ~/.kube
- sudo kubectl config view --raw | tee ~/.kube/config
- sudo chmod 666 ~/.kube/config
- arkade install openfaas
